extendedInfo.description: Book Shelf - Track the Books you own and the Books you wantOrganise your library, scan Books directly into your shelves.When you're in a shop, find out if you have a Book already, keep its ISBN or see it directly via the web.New to version 4.3.1** Mics fixes around bulk operations** More Connectivity checks* Organise your Books into shelfs  - Online and offline help* Give your Books:  - Star Ratings  - Release Date  - Series Name and Number (even allows numbers such as 1a or 1.5)  - Actors  - Studio  - Image  - Genre  - Description  - Characters  - Wanted / Owned / Read tags - with icons  - custom sequence number for sorting  - Color the title  - Add more custom fields or hide some main fields* Scan ISBNs  - supports continual scan and add, with adjustable focus interval  - automatically looks up info for scanned ISBNs's  - library mode scanning* Edit your details  - quick update fields in the list/grid view via multi select or the context menu  - shrink unused fields in the edit view  - track who you've loaned your Books to* Home Screen  - Direct access to your favourite list - set any lsit as a favourite  - Can change your startup screen* Multiple views  - sort your shelves by title, series, author, date released and rating, sequence - per shelf  - view just Books that are wanted, not owned or not read or any other tag  - view images in your list  - view Books in a list or grid format - per shelf  - changable icons on the screens* Lookup information   - supports standard and in-depth searches, region order can be changed in settings  - control what level of internet connection is required for various searches  - both us and uk sources   - Lookup up all info on a shelf in one go  - Download missing images on a shelf in one go* View/Buy a Book via the internet  - search by actor, title or ISBN  - Scan a ISBN and then view directly on the internet  - type a Book title and search on the internet* Export and Import Shelves  - multiple export and import formats: csv, xml and txt (tab separated)  - export various fields from just ISBN to all fields (including custom fields)  - export directly to email  - files saved to/read from SD card for easy access  - import prevents duplicates (via ISBN), or allows them  - map file fields to your fields during import  - save anywhere requires a file system app such as 'File Manager' or 'Astro'* Search your Books for any text field  - control which fields can be searched in settings  - fully integrated with quick search (will need enabling in global search options)* Share Book details with other applications  - directly to clipboard  - export to our database* Store an image for your book  - take a photo  - select an image from the web  - type a url for the image  * Many maintenance options, in the menus and in the settings  - set default values for common main fields  - add, rename, move, delete shelves and Books* Customize the fields   - add other fields that you want  - hide the fields you don't want to see, including most pre-defined fields  - can be renamed or changed to take multiple values  - edit the values for a (lookup) field in one easy place, including delete, merge and rename  - clear a field of all values* Backup and restore  - full back up and restore to the sd card  - automatic backups  - restore settings and data seperately* SD Card Support  - move the application  - store the images on the SD card  - hide the images from the gallery viewerPermissions required:Full Internet - for information lookup (and ads)External Storage - for exports and importsCamera - for scanning ISBNsStart at Boot - for intialising auto backupPlease email all suggestions or queries (and problems) to dionhardy200@googlemail.com

reviews.title: Best app Ever!!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing and completly flawless! This does everything I need it for and more. No more guessing if I have already bought a book or read the book, etc. So extremley happy, thank you so much for a perfect app!!
reviews.author: Evette Dietrich

reviews.title: Handy App
reviews.comment: I have used this app for a few months and think it does a good job.  There is a bit of a learning curve for using the ISBN reader.  There are two modes--one scans the barcode one book at a time and makes you wait while it searches for that book on the web.  The other mode will look up scanned books up while you continue to scan other books in your library.  This is helpful, but if the process is interrupted, I had to go back and request individual lookup for books later on.  The program does not work well once the phone goes into \"idle\" mode\", and if you \"wake up\" the phone, it interrupts the lookup process.  That being said, it is the best app I have seen for the Android to get your library into your phone, and the search function works quite well.
reviews.author: Kristen French

reviews.title: GREAT APPS!
reviews.comment: Very happy with app...everything working great...have this, dvdshelf and comic shelf also...only thing I would have a suggestion for would be if you could add a quantity on each listing in the individual items page and also on the shelf listings in each of the apps...thanks
reviews.author: Paul Gilpatrick

reviews.title: Broken scanner
reviews.comment: The isbn scanner is not able to focus at all
reviews.author: M. Larsen

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: When you scan the isbn number none of the information comes up. What\'s the point of the scanner option if it doesn\'t do anything.
reviews.author: Cathy Raboldt

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great and rapid response to support questions as well. Best of this type of app I have tried.
reviews.author: Kevin Jackson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. It makes it really easy to keep track of my books and it\'s very easy to use. I love the amount of detail I can put on each book. I also love that you can just scan in the ISBN and all the information is filled in for you. Needs sub-shelves, though. That would be amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic Time Saver For Me!
reviews.comment: I have a large (~1000 books) professional \"working library\" that I use every day. The bookshelf app has become an indispensable tool for me, and a wonderful time saver. I used to spend lengthy periods scanning my shelves, trying to find a particular book. Now, I can go straight to the right shelf in seconds. Another benefit is that I used to end up buying duplicate copies of a book I forgot I already had. Now I can quickly check my library to see if I already have a book (which I may have forgotten about). It took a while to get used to the user interface of the Bookshelf app, but it now seems easy. It took some time to scan in all my books -- and the automatic looku-p process sometimes needs a bit of prodding, but overall the data entry has not been too much of a barrier. I highly recommend Bookshelf to anyone who has a large library and is tired of wasting time looking for a particular item.
reviews.author: Steve Bittinger

reviews.comment: Hit scan and get an automatic error message on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: christopher torres

reviews.title: Bookshelf
reviews.comment: Love it!!!
reviews.author: Jeremy Hintze

reviews.title: Are the changes an improvement?
reviews.comment: Lack of explanation of the changes and how to use them and the loss of the star ratings on the books on what used to be the front page means that the program is less functional than it was as far as I am concerned. A good program should be intuitive this is not. It could also do with a place for an individual comment on each book. However it is still useful.
reviews.author: Roger Penniceard

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Was briefly confused by new release but sorted now. Use this app all tje time to tack my collections.
reviews.author: Philip King

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I love this app. I own hundreds of books and regularly shop at different book sales in my area. I needed something that allowed me to quickly verify the titles I already own and track the titles I still need to find. This app gives me that capacity.  I would really like to see the ability to nest shelves such as by genre then author (e.g. main shelf = Fiction + sub shelf = Author). This would allow me to organize my library in a more granular fashion, although I realize that it could complicate the application\'s interface.  The author also offers useful apps for CD and DVD libraries. Making a donation gets you a key that removes advertisements for all of the apps, although you need to enter the key into each app. It was worth making a donation to remove the ads especially when considering the value I received for the product.  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Jim Richards

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: I scan my book and the title is the isbn. Not useful in keeping stock of what books you have I think
reviews.author: Brenda Brown

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Compared apps: Codex Book Shelf and Book Catalogue side by side. Used same books for test. Codex was very very slow to bring back scanned results and then only brought a partial cover image. Book shelf was better but not very intuitive and only brought back b&w cover image. Book catalogue was fast, full color and much more intuitive, although it has its share of confusing things. Also, wish it synced up to a website to keep and maintain library from multiple places.
reviews.author: James Batchelor

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I use to have the ibookshelf until i switched to android. I love this app. But i wish it had an in progress button under editing the book. Also, it might be there but i havent found it yet, is a way to look through the books by status like wanted, read, unread.  And sometimes it takes forever for the barcode to scan. But other than these small things i really like the app. You just scan and edit. I keep my read, unread and wanted in different shelves. I highly recommend this app for any book lover!
reviews.author: jacqueline bronson

reviews.title: Can be improved
reviews.comment: But not bad.  Older books are very much manual imputed, if the barcode is confused it will guess (author, series, ect)  and keep those selection in the click-drag options forever... But still better then other apps
reviews.author: Nemo Mapson

reviews.title: Only one complaint
reviews.comment: The scanner takes forever to scan on most of my books and is often wrong; it\'s easier and takes less time to manually input them. The rest of the app is great.
reviews.author: Erin Scrogum

reviews.title: Has Problems
reviews.comment: Mostly a good app but I wish I could see the series title along with the author name at the bottom. Also, the sort by series function doesn\'t always work on all the books in a series. I wish there was a way to have some sort of folder inside a shelf or something to sort the books by their series instead of just listing them...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: Finally an easy to use app to manage my library.  It doesn\'t tell you what books are missing in a series, but if you can count, you can figure that out yourself.  It\'s fantastic and I was able to organize my personal  library in no time flat.  FINALLY! Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User
